attributes.review: i got the💃🏼 app and was super🍄 excited to ✨see my amazing bunker boy ⚡️president🤡but when i logged on, 💅all i saw 👩🏻‍🦯was an orange🍊on the💛 loading🦹‍♀️ screen. whoever made this better fix this or else.🧚🏼‍♀️also, i saw in the 🕺🏻reviews many🍃 mentally ill 5️⃣0️⃣year olds. 👨‍❤️‍👨 this is literally a cult ✌🏻☺️

attributes.review: because i love my president so much i decided to download his app to support him. i wanted to keep up with his campaign but i was bombarded with notifications, and it also asked me for my credit card information right away. this is not what i wanted 😡
